20101202162019.857|20101202162020.571|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101202162020.571|20101202162021.286|CCO|
20101202162021.286|20101202162022.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101202162022.000|20101202162022.625|CCO|    
20101202162022.625|20101202162023.250|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101202162023.250|20101202162023.875|CCO|        
20101202162023.875|20101202162024.500|CCO|            save lives.
20101202162024.500|20101202162025.125|CCO|    
20101202162025.125|20101202162025.750|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101202162025.750|20101202162026.375|CCO|    
20101202162026.375|20101202162027.000|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101202162027.000|20101202162027.625|CCO|    
20101202162027.625|20101202162028.250|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101202162028.250|20101202162028.875|CCO|    
20101202162028.875|20101202162029.500|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101202162029.500|20101202162030.125|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101202162030.125|20101202162030.750|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101202162030.750|20101202162031.375|CCO|
20101202162031.375|20101202162032.000|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101202162032.000|20101202162032.625|CCO|    
20101202162032.625|20101202162033.250|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101202162033.250|20101202162033.875|CCO|        
20101202162033.875|20101202162034.500|CCO|          genetic tests
20101202162034.500|20101202162035.125|CCO|    
20101202162035.125|20101202162035.750|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101202162035.750|20101202162036.375|CCO|    
20101202162036.375|20101202162037.000|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101202162037.000|20101202162037.625|CCO|
20101202162037.625|20101202162038.250|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101202162038.250|20101202162038.875|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101202162038.875|20101202162039.500|CCO|    
20101202162039.500|20101202162040.125|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101202162040.125|20101202162040.750|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101202162040.750|20101202162041.375|CCO|
20101202162041.375|20101202162042.000|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101202162042.000|20101202162042.556|CCO|    
20101202162042.556|20101202162043.111|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101202162043.111|20101202162043.667|CCO|    
20101202162043.667|20101202162044.222|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101202162044.222|20101202162044.778|CCO|
20101202162044.778|20101202162045.333|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101202162045.333|20101202162045.889|CCO|    
20101202162045.889|20101202162046.444|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101202162046.444|20101202162047.000|CCO|
20101202162047.000|20101202162047.556|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101202162047.556|20101202162048.111|CCO|    
20101202162048.111|20101202162048.667|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101202162048.667|20101202162049.222|CCO|    
20101202162049.222|20101202162049.778|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101202162049.778|20101202162050.333|CCO|        
20101202162050.333|20101202162050.889|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101202162050.889|20101202162051.444|CCO|    
20101202162051.444|20101202162052.000|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101202162052.000|20101202162052.833|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101202162052.833|20101202162053.667|CCO|    
20101202162053.667|20101202162054.500|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101202162054.500|20101202162055.333|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101202162055.333|20101202162056.167|CCO|    
20101202162056.167|20101202162057.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101202162057.000|20101202162057.833|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101202162057.833|20101202162058.667|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101202162058.667|20101202162059.500|CCO|

20101202165154.000|20101202165156.000|CCO|STUDENTS FOR THE SCHOOL OF THE

20101202165158.000|20101202165200.000|CCO|>> I IMAGINE YOU HAD YOUR WORK 
20101202165200.000|20101202165202.000|CCO|CUT OUT FOR YOU WHEN YOU FIRST 
20101202165202.000|20101202165203.667|CCO|PITCHED THE IDEA.
20101202165203.667|20101202165205.333|CCO|LET'S BE HONEST, IT'S NOT THE 
20101202165205.333|20101202165207.000|CCO|NORMAL BREED THAT WOULD COME TO 
20101202165207.000|20101202165208.667|CCO|MIND WHEN YOU'RE MATCHING AN DOG
